verses.verse: Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, <S%H702>yea<s%>, for four, I will not turn <S%H7725>away<s%> the punishment <S%H8313>thereof<s%>; because he burned the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> into <S%H7875>lime<s%>:

but I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> upon <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> of <S%H7152>Kerioth<s%>; and <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> with <S%H7588>tumult<s%>, with <S%H8643>shouting<s%>, and with the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>;

and I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H8199>judge<s%> from the <S%H7130>midst<s%> <S%H2026>thereof<s%>, and will slay all the <S%H8269>princes<s%> thereof with <S%H559>him<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H702>yea<s%>, for four, I will not turn <S%H7725>away<s%> the punishment <S%H3988>thereof<s%>; because they have rejected the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> his <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, and their <S%H3577>lies<s%> have caused them to <S%H8582>err<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> which their <S%H1>fathers<s%> did <S%H1980>walk<s%>:
but I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> upon <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H702>yea<s%>, for four, I will not turn <S%H7725>away<s%> the punishment <S%H4376>thereof<s%>; because they have sold the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> for <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and the <S%H34>needy<s%> for a pair of <S%H5275>shoes<s%>â€”

they that <S%H7602>pant<s%> after the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor<s%>, and turn <S%H5186>aside<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6035>meek<s%>: and a <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> unto the same <S%H5291>maiden<s%>, to <S%H2490>profane<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>:

and they lay themselves <S%H5186>down<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> every <S%H4196>altar<s%> upon <S%H899>clothes<s%> taken in <S%H2254>pledge<s%>; and in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H430>God<s%> they <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of such as have been <S%H6064>fined<s%>.

Yet <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> I the <S%H567>Amorite<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1363>them<s%>, whose height was like the <S%H1363>height<s%> of the <S%H730>cedars<s%>, and he was <S%H2634>strong<s%> as the <S%H437>oaks<s%>; yet I <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> his <S%H6529>fruit<s%> from <S%H4605>above<s%>, and his roots from <S%H8328>beneath<s%>.

Also I brought you <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H3212>led<s%> you <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorite<s%>.

And I raised <S%H6965>up<s%> of your <S%H1121>sons<s%> for <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, and of your young <S%H970>men<s%> for <S%H5139>Nazirites<s%>. Is it not even <S%H1121>thus<s%>, O ye children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
But ye gave the <S%H5139>Nazirites<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%>, and <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Prophesy <S%H5012>not<s%>.
Behold <S%H5781><s%>, I will press you in your <S%H5699>place<s%>, as a cart <S%H5781>presseth<s%> that is <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5995>sheaves<s%>.

And <S%H4498>flight<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%> from the <S%H7031>swift<s%>; and the <S%H2389>strong<s%> shall not <S%H553>strengthen<s%> his <S%H3581>force<s%>; neither shall the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H4422>deliver<s%> <S%H5315>himself<s%>;

neither shall he <S%H5975>stand<s%> that <S%H8610>handleth<s%> the <S%H7198>bow<s%>; and he that is <S%H7031>swift<s%> of <S%H7272>foot<s%> shall not <S%H4422>deliver<s%> <S%H7392>himself<s%>; neither shall he that rideth the <S%H5483>horse<s%> <S%H4422>deliver<s%> <S%H5315>himself<s%>;
and he that is <S%H533>courageous<s%> among the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> shall flee <S%H5127>away<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
